\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\global\long\def\sign{\operatorname{sgn}}%

\global\long\def\ch{\operatorname{ch}}%

\global\long\def\sh{\operatorname{sh}}%

\global\long\def\th{\operatorname{th}}%


\section{K(x)}

\begin{align*}
\beta & =\sqrt{\frac{\epsilon_{1}}{\epsilon_{0}}}\\
\epsilon(q) & =\epsilon_{1}\epsilon_{0}\frac{1+(q\xi)^{2}}{\epsilon_{1}+\epsilon_{0}(q\xi)^{2}}\\
K(x) & =\frac{1}{2\pi}\epsilon_{0}\epsilon_{1}\int\limits _{-\infty}^{+\infty}\frac{1+(q\xi)^{2}}{\epsilon_{1}+\epsilon_{0}(q\xi)}e^{iqx}dq=\\
 & =\frac{\epsilon_{1}}{2\pi}\int e^{iqx}(1+\frac{\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1}}{\epsilon_{1}+\epsilon_{0}(q\xi)^{2}})dq=\\
 & =\epsilon_{1}\delta(x)+(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})\frac{\beta}{2\xi}e^{-\beta\frac{|x|}{\xi}}
\end{align*}


\section{D(x)}

Let's pretend that $E(x)=E_{0}+E_{1}e^{\frac{x-h}{\xi}}+E_{1}e^{\frac{-x-h}{\xi}}=E_{0}+2E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})$

$D(x)=\int\limits _{-h}^{h}K(x-x')E(x')dx'=\int\limits _{-h}^{h}\left(\epsilon_{1}\delta(x-x')+\frac{\beta}{2\xi}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})e^{-\beta\frac{|x-x'|}{\epsilon}}\right)\left(E_{0}+2E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})\right)$

\subsection{$D_{1}$}

$D_{1}(x)=\int\epsilon_{1}\delta(x-x')\left(E_{0}+E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})\right)=\epsilon_{1}E_{0}+\epsilon_{1}E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})$

\subsection{$D_{2}$}

\begin{align*}
D_{2}(x) & =\frac{\beta}{2\xi}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{0}\int e^{-\beta\frac{|x-x'|}{\epsilon}}dx'=\\
 & =\frac{\beta}{2\xi}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{0}\left[\int\limits _{-h}^{x}\exp(-\beta\frac{x-x'}{\xi})dx'+\int\limits _{x}^{h}\exp(\beta\frac{x-x'}{\xi})\right]=\\
 & =\frac{\beta}{2\xi}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{0}\left[e^{-\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}\frac{\xi}{\beta}\left(e^{\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}-e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\right)-e^{\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}\frac{\xi}{\beta}\left(e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}-e^{-\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}\right)\right]=\\
 & =(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{0}\left(1-e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch\left(\beta\frac{x}{\xi}\right)\right)
\end{align*}


\subsection{$D_{3}$}

\begin{align*}
D_{3}(x) & =\frac{\beta}{2\xi}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\int\limits _{-h}^{+h}e^{-\beta\frac{|x-x'|}{\xi}}\ch\left(\frac{x'}{\xi}\right)dx'=\\
 & =\frac{\beta}{4\xi}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\left[e^{-\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}\int\limits _{-h}^{x}\left(e^{\frac{x'}{\xi}(1+\beta)}+e^{\frac{x'}{\xi}(\beta-1)}\right)dx'+e^{\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}\int\limits _{x}^{h}\left(e^{\frac{x'}{\xi}(1-\beta)}+e^{-\frac{x'}{\xi}(1+\beta)}\right)dx'\right]=\\
 & =\frac{\beta}{4\xi}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\text{\ensuremath{\Bigg[}}e^{-\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}\left(\frac{\xi}{1+\beta}\left\{ e^{\frac{x}{\xi}(1+\beta)}-e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(1+\beta)}\right\} +\frac{\xi}{\beta-1}\left\{ e^{\frac{x}{\xi}(\beta-1)}-e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(\beta-1)}\right\} \right)+\\
 & +e^{\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}\left(\frac{\xi}{1-\beta}\left\{ e^{\frac{h}{\xi}(1-\beta)}-e^{\frac{x}{\xi}(1-\beta)}\right\} -\frac{\xi}{\beta+1}\left\{ e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(1+\beta)}-e^{-\frac{x}{\xi}(1+\beta)}\right\} \right)\Bigg]=\\
 & =\frac{1}{4}\beta(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\Bigg[\frac{1}{1+\beta}\left(e^{\frac{x}{\xi}}-e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(1+\beta)-\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}-e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(1+\beta)+\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}+e^{-\frac{x}{\xi}}\right)+\frac{1}{\beta-1}\left(e^{-\frac{x}{\xi}}-e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(\beta-1)-\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}-e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(\beta-1)+\beta\frac{x}{\xi}}+e^{\frac{x}{\xi}}\right)\Bigg]=\\
 & =\frac{1}{4}\beta(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\Bigg[\frac{2}{1+\beta}\left(\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})-\ch(\beta\frac{x}{\xi})e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(1+\beta)}\right)-\frac{2}{1-\beta}\left(\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})-\ch(\beta\frac{x}{\xi})e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}(\beta-1)}\right)\Bigg]=\\
 & =\frac{1}{4}\beta(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\Bigg[-\frac{4\beta}{1-\beta^{2}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})-2\ch(\beta\frac{x}{\xi})e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\left(\frac{e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}}{1+\beta}-\frac{e^{\frac{h}{\xi}}}{1-\beta}\right)\Bigg]=\\
 & =\frac{1}{4}\beta(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\Bigg[-\frac{4\beta}{1-\beta^{2}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})-2\ch(\beta\frac{x}{\xi})e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\left(\frac{-2\sh(\frac{h}{\xi})-2\beta\ch(\frac{h}{\xi})}{1-\beta^{2}}\right)\Bigg]=\\
 & =\frac{\beta}{1-\beta^{2}}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\Bigg[-\beta\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})+\ch(\beta\frac{x}{\xi})e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\left(\sh(\frac{h}{\xi})+\beta\ch(\frac{h}{\xi})\right)\Bigg]
\end{align*}


\subsection{$D(x)$}

\begin{align*}
D(x) & =D_{1}(x)+D_{2}(x)+D_{3}(x)=\\
 & =\epsilon_{1}E_{0}+\epsilon_{1}E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})+(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{0}\left(1-e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch\left(\beta\frac{x}{\xi}\right)\right)+\\
 & +\frac{\beta}{1-\beta^{2}}(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{1}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\Bigg[-\beta\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})+\ch(\beta\frac{x}{\xi})e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\left(\sh(\frac{h}{\xi})+\beta\ch(\frac{h}{\xi})\right)\Bigg]\\
 & =\epsilon_{0}E_{0}+\ch\left(\beta\frac{x}{\xi}\right)e^{-\beta\frac{h}{\xi}}\left[-(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})E_{0}+\frac{E_{1}\epsilon_{1}}{\beta}\left(\sh(\frac{h}{\xi})+\beta\ch(\frac{h}{\xi})\right)\right]
\end{align*}


\section{$\frac{d}{dx}D(x)=0$ }

$E_{1}=E_{0}\beta\frac{\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1}}{\epsilon_{1}\left[\sh\left(\frac{h}{\xi}\right)+\beta\ \ch\left(\frac{h}{\xi}\right)\right]}$

\textcyr{\CYRI\cyrt\cyro\cyrg\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyre\cyrm} 

$D=E_{0}\epsilon_{0}$

$E(x)=E_{0}\left(1+\frac{(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})\beta}{\epsilon_{1}\left(\sh(\frac{h}{\xi})+\beta\ch(\frac{h}{\xi})\right)}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})\right)$

\textcyr{\CYRCH\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn\cyryu}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyro\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrt\cyrv\cyru\cyre\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyri\cyrs\cyra\cyrn\cyrn\cyro\cyrm\cyru}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrk\cyre}. \textcyr{\CYRV\cyri\cyrd\cyri\cyrm\cyro},
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrs\cyru\cyrt\cyrs\cyrt\cyrv\cyri\cyre} $(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})$
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrd} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrt\cyro\cyrr\cyrery\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyra\cyrg\cyra\cyre\cyrm\cyrery\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrv}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyre} (6) \textcyr{\cyrv}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyrk\cyre} - \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrp\cyre\cyrch\cyra\cyrt\cyrk\cyra},
\textcyr{\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyre\cyrp\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyri\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}. \textcyr{\CYRV\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrzh\cyra\cyrya}
P(x)

$P(x)=\frac{E_{0}}{4\pi}\left((\epsilon_{0}-1)-\frac{(\epsilon_{0}-\epsilon_{1})\beta}{\epsilon_{1}\left(\sh(\frac{h}{\xi})+\beta\ch(\frac{h}{\xi})\right)}e^{-\frac{h}{\xi}}\ch(\frac{x}{\xi})\right)$

\section{K(x)}

\textcyr{\CYRN\cyra\cyrishrt\cyrd\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyryu}
\textcyr{\CYRG\cyrr\cyri\cyrn\cyra} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
(2.19)
\begin{align*}
\delta(x-x') & =\alpha G(x')-\delta G^{''}(x')\\
G(x,x') & =\begin{cases}
C_{1}e^{-\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-x')}+C_{2}e^{\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-x')}, & x'<x\\
C_{3}e^{-\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-x')}+C_{4}e^{\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-x')}, & x'>x
\end{cases}\\
\text{\textcyr{\CYRI}\textcyr{\cyrz}} & \text{\textcyr{\cyrn}\textcyr{\cyre}\textcyr{\cyrp}\textcyr{\cyrr}\textcyr{\cyre}\textcyr{\cyrr}\textcyr{\cyrery}\textcyr{\cyrv}\textcyr{\cyrn}\textcyr{\cyro}\textcyr{\cyrs}\textcyr{\cyrt}\textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrs}\textcyr{\cyrk}\textcyr{\cyra}\textcyr{\cyrch}\textcyr{\cyrk}\textcyr{\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrp}\textcyr{\cyrr}\textcyr{\cyro}\textcyr{\cyri}\textcyr{\cyrz}\textcyr{\cyrv}\textcyr{\cyro}\textcyr{\cyrd}\textcyr{\cyrn}\textcyr{\cyro}\textcyr{\cyrishrt} }\\
 & \begin{cases}
G(x,x+0)=G(x,x-0)\\
-\delta\left[G^{'}(x,x+0)-G^{'}(x,x-0)\right]=1
\end{cases}\\
 & \begin{cases}
C_{1}+C_{2}=C_{3}+C_{4}\\
-C_{1}+C_{2}+C_{3}-C_{4}=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}
\end{cases}\\
 & \begin{cases}
C_{1}-C_{3}=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}\\
C_{2}-C_{4}=-\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}
\end{cases}
\end{align*}
\\
\textcyr{\CYRD\cyra\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrsh\cyre} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrd\cyru\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz\cyrl\cyri\cyrch\cyri\cyrya}. \textcyr{\CYRU}
\textcyr{\CYRT\cyra\cyrg\cyra\cyrn\cyrc\cyre\cyrv\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrn}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrs\cyrl\cyro\cyrv\cyri\cyrya} $G(x,-h)=G(x,h)=0$.
\textcyr{\CYRV} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrr\cyrm\cyri\cyrn\cyra\cyrh}
$C_{1},C_{2}$

\begin{align*}
 & \begin{cases}
C_{1}e^{-\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+h)}+C_{2}e^{\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+h)}=0\\
C_{3}e^{-\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-h)}+C_{4}e^{\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-h)}=0
\end{cases}\\
 & \text{\textcyr{\CYRI}\textcyr{\cyrt}\textcyr{\cyro}\textcyr{\cyrg}\textcyr{\cyro} \textcyr{\cyri}\textcyr{\cyrm}\textcyr{\cyre}\textcyr{\cyre}\textcyr{\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrs}\textcyr{\cyri}\textcyr{\cyrs}\textcyr{\cyrt}\textcyr{\cyre}\textcyr{\cyrm}\textcyr{\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrn}\textcyr{\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrk}\textcyr{\cyro}\textcyr{\cyrerev}\textcyr{\cyrf}\textcyr{\cyri}\textcyr{\cyrc}\textcyr{\cyri}\textcyr{\cyre}\textcyr{\cyrn}\textcyr{\cyrt}\textcyr{\cyrery}}\\
 & \begin{cases}
C_{1}=-C_{2}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+h)}\\
C_{3}=-C_{4}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-h)}\\
C_{1}-C_{3}=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}\\
C_{2}-C_{4}=-\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}
\end{cases}\\
 & \begin{cases}
-C_{2}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+h)}+C_{4}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-h)}=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}\\
C_{2}-C_{4}=-\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}
\end{cases}\\
 & -C_{4}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+h)}+\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+h)}+C_{4}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x-h)}=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}\\
 & -2C_{4}e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}x}\sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}}\left(1-e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+h)}\right)\\
 & C_{4}=-\frac{e^{-2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}x}-e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h}}{4\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\\
 & C_{2}=\frac{\left(-e^{-2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}x}+e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h}-2\sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)\right)}{4\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}=\frac{-e^{-2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}x}+e^{-2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h}}{4\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\\
 & C_{3}=\frac{e^{-2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h}-e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}x}}{4\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\\
 & C_{1}=\frac{e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h}-e^{2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}x}}{4\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\\
G(x,x') & =\begin{cases}
\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\left[\ch\left(\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}\left\{ x-x'-2h\right\} \right)-\ch\left[\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+x')\right]\right] & x'<x\\
\frac{1}{2\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\left[\ch\left(\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}\left\{ x-x'+2h\right\} \right)-\ch\left[\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}(x+x')\right]\right] & x'>x
\end{cases}\\
G(x,x') & =\begin{cases}
\frac{1}{\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\sh\left[\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}\left(h+x'\right)\right]\sh\left[\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}\left(h-x\right)\right] & x'<x\\
\frac{1}{\sqrt{\delta\alpha}\ \sh\left(2\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\right)}\sh\left[\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}\left(h-x'\right)\right]\sh\left[\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}\left(h+x\right)\right] & x'>x
\end{cases}
\end{align*}
\\
\textcyr{\CYRU} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrzh\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrya\cyrd\cyrr\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrg\cyrl\cyrya\cyrd\cyri\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrk\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyre}. \textcyr{\CYRO\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyro\cyrt\cyrv\cyrt\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrt\cyrv\cyru\cyre\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrn} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrs\cyrl\cyro\cyrv\cyri\cyrya\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyri\cyrm}, \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro} $C_{2}=C_{3}=0$.
\textcyr{\CYRE\cyrs\cyrl\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrs\cyrs\cyrm\cyro\cyrt\cyrr\cyre\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyre\cyrl} $\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\delta}}h\gg x\to\infty$
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyrn\cyro}
$C_{2},C_{3}\to0$ \textcyr{\cyri} $G\to\#e^{-\#|x-x'|}$
